item.description:
Due to the over whelming success of the
last model event he had last week were
going to do it again by popular demand.

This event was started with the simple idea
of networking photographers with models.
Now it has grown to include hair stylists,
designers & make-up artists. This is a
jumping point for any photographer.
In the past we’ve had people with $500
dollar cameras to $30 thousand dollar
cameras come in and shoot side by side.
The Great Model shoot is a great place to ask
questions and learn about new techniques
and network or build up your portfolio.
If you’re on the other end of things such as
designers, make-up artists & hair stylists;
you get to build your portfolio as well by
networking and getting photos of your work.
Models will also get to build their portfolio
and network with other models and photographers.

We’ve adjusted the price to compensate for
studio rental and all the little extra’s included.
This is a great chance to build everyone’s portfolio
in a professional environment. LensProToGo
is located in Concord MA and contains all modern
equipment from Nikon & Canon.

$40 for photographers
$20 for models
payable via PayPal or cash the day of the event.


This is what is included with the price.

Building everyone’s portfolio
Networking opportunities
Education on styles & equipment
On site technical support
Discount rentals on equipment
Refreshments / breakfast & lunch
Legal forms for photographers & models
Make-up artists & hair stylist
7 to 8 hours of studio time



More details at: unitymike.com
Just click on the link for "The Great Model Shoot"
item.name: The Great Model Shoot v2
